targets.query:
import "strings"

getTestData = (data, testName) => {
  return data
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r.testName == testName)
}

allData = from(bucket: "client_metrics_raw")
  |> range(start: -10y)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with 
    testGroup: strings.split(v: r.filename, t: ".")[0],
    testName: strings.split(v: r.filename, t: ".")[1],
  }))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with 
    testId: (r.testGroup + "." + r.testName),
    _value: r._value / 1000.0
  }))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.testGroup == "${workload}" and r.metric != "cleanup")

t1Data = getTestData(data: allData, testName: "EX1")
t2Data = getTestData(data: allData, testName: "EX2")

t1Mean = t1Data |> mean() |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with valType: "mean", testGroup: "${workload}", testName: "EX1"})) |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with testId: r.testGroup + "." + r.testName }))
t1Min = t1Data |> min() |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with valType: "min"}))
t1Max = t1Data |> max() |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with valType: "max"}))
//t1P99 = t1Data |> quantile(q:0.90)

unionedData = union(tables: [t1Mean, t1Min, t1Max])
  |> drop(columns: ["_time", "_field", "_start", "_stop", "bucket", "filename"])

pivotedData = unionedData
  |> pivot(rowKey:["testId"], columnKey: ["valType"], valueColumn: "_value")

pivotedData
//unionedData

import "strings"

firstTestName = "EX1"

getStartTime = (data, testName) => {
  return data
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r.testName == testName)
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r.metric == "read" or r.metric == "update")
    |> first()
    |> findRecord(fn: (key) => true, idx: 0)
}

timeDiff = (t1, t2) => {
  return if exists t2._time then uint(v: t2._time) - uint(v: t1._time) else uint(v: 0)
}

getTestData = (data, testName) => {
  t1Start = getStartTime(data: data, testName: firstTestName)
  t2Start = getStartTime(data: data, testName: testName)
  diff = timeDiff(t1: t1Start, t2: t2Start)
  return data
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r.testName == testName)
    |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _time: time(v: uint(v: r._time) - diff)}))
}

allData = from(bucket: "client_metrics_raw")
  |> range(start: -10y)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
    r with 
    testGroup: strings.split(v: r.filename, t: ".")[0],
    testName: strings.split(v: r.filename, t: ".")[1],
  }))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.testGroup == "${workload}" and r.metric != "cleanup")

t1Data = getTestData(data: allData, testName: "EX1")
t2Data = getTestData(data: allData, testName: "EX2")

union(tables: [t1Data, t2Data])
  |> rename(columns: {filename: "testId"})
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with 
      testId: (r.testGroup + "." + r.testName),
      _value: r._value / 1000.0
    }))

import "strings"

firstTestName = "EX1"

getStartTime = (data, testName) => {
  return data
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r.testName == testName)
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r.metric == "read" or r.metric == "update")
    |> first()
    |> findRecord(fn: (key) => true, idx: 0)
}

timeDiff = (t1, t2) => {
  return if exists t2._time then uint(v: t2._time) - uint(v: t1._time) else uint(v: 0)
}

getTestData = (data, testName) => {
  t1Start = getStartTime(data: data, testName: firstTestName)
  t2Start = getStartTime(data: data, testName: testName)
  diff = timeDiff(t1: t1Start, t2: t2Start)
  return data
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r.testName == testName)
    |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _time: time(v: uint(v: r._time) - diff)}))
}

allData = from(bucket: "client_metrics_raw")
  |> range(start: -10y)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
    r with 
    testGroup: strings.split(v: r.filename, t: ".")[0],
    testName: strings.split(v: r.filename, t: ".")[1],
  }))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.testGroup == "${workload}" and r.metric != "cleanup")

t1Data = getTestData(data: allData, testName: "EX1")
t2Data = getTestData(data: allData, testName: "EX2")

unioned = union(tables: [t1Data, t2Data])
  |> rename(columns: {filename: "testId"})
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with 
      testId: (r.testGroup + "." + r.testName),
      _value: r._value / 1000.0
    }))

unioned
  |> group(columns: ["testId"])
  |> window(every: 100ms)
  |> mean()
  |> duplicate(column: "_stop", as: "_time")
  |> window(every: inf)
